name: Payment Due Soon - Email
subject: Payment Due Reminder - {{feeName}}
template:
Dear {{studentName}},

This is a friendly reminder that your payment for {{feeName}} in the amount of ${{amount}} is due on {{dueDate}}.

Please make your payment at your earliest convenience to avoid any late fees.

If you have any questions, please contact us.

Thank you,
FeeFlow Team

name: Payment Overdue - SMS
template: Hi {{studentName}}, your payment of ${{amount}} for {{feeName}} was due on {{dueDate}}. Please pay ASAP to avoid late fees. Contact us for assistance.

name: Final Notice - Email
subject: FINAL NOTICE - Payment Required for {{feeName}}

name: Weekly Payment Reminder - SMS
template: Reminder: {{studentName}}, your {{feeName}} payment of ${{amount}} is due {{dueDate}}. Pay online or call us.
